Judul: ANALYSIS OF RESIDENCE FINANCING WITH SYARIAH SYSTEM IN X SYARIAH BRANCH OF BANDUNG
Abstrak: In daily life, people have need that must be fulfilled even its primary, secondary or tersier. There is one time people cannot afford their needs. Because of that, in economic development, there is financing service from financial institutions which called house financing or Kredit Pemilikan Rumah (KPR). Financial Institutions itself divided into two types, syariah and conventional. The difference between them is the basic procedure and law that they used. Law that used by syariah is based on syariah principles and actlaw of banking meanwhile the conventional law is only based on act law of banking.This final project tries to describe the process of financing execution in the both institution from debtor's point of view, by taking some of X case examples of financing execution also in conventional financial institution. It includes the cost occurred from the process. This process and the cost would be compared to conventional bank to see which one gives more advantage to debtor.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Drs. H. Arson Aliludin, SE, DEA.
Kata Kunci: House Financing, Financial Institution, Syariah, Conventional, Equivalence Interest Rate.
